title: Pillar Mt. Downhill
description: Kodiak's Pillar Mountain Downhill Ride on the Backside trail during Crabfest.
course:
The ride will be held on Sunday, May 29th at 2PM, Racers will meet at the entrance to the backside trail on Pillar Mt, approximately 3/4th's to the top, roadside.  The race ends at the Pillar Creek Hatchery parking lot, located at 9547 Monashka Bay Road - approximately halfway outside of town to "White Sands Beach".  Transportation will not be provided!  Helmets are absolutely required. 

The Backside trail can be a very challenging and dangerous trail to ride when ridden at full speed.  It is, however a perfectly capable trail for riders of all skill levels and ages with proper respect for their environment.
registration: Registration can be done at 58 Degrees North - located at 1231 Mill Bay Road.  A registration fee of 10$ per rider will be required as well as a signed waiver - anyone under the age of 18 will require an approved legal guardian or parent's signature as well.
notes:
Helmets are 100% Required!!!  Barbecue after race possibly pending at Pillar Creek.  Transportation not provided.

Race Starts at 2pm
directions:
Start - Backside trail pull-off, roughly 3/4 to the top of Pillar Mt.  Signs will be posted.

End - Pillar Creek Hatchery parking lot. 9547 Monashka Bay Rd.
